body_html:
Invoking @vrv who has suffered a long time working on the differences in behavior between int32 and int64.

Can you not do a cast from int64 to int32 to get the effect you want? I.e., do you really have a >4B-element vector that you want to access in practice?
body_text:
Invoking @vrv who has suffered a long time working on the differences in behavior between int32 and int64.
Can you not do a cast from int64 to int32 to get the effect you want? I.e., do you really have a >4B-element vector that you want to access in practice?
body:
Invoking @vrv who has suffered a long time working on the differences in behavior between int32 and int64. 

Can you not do a cast from int64 to int32 to get the effect you want? I.e., do you really have a >4B-element vector that you want to access in practice?
